laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased to 41.1% on admission, then decreased to 33.1% on 9th day, 34.0% on 16th day, and 32.2% on 20th day.
Increased to 15.0 g/dl on admission, then decreased to 11.4 g/dl on 9th day, 12.0 g/dl on 16th day, and 10.8 g/dl on 20th day.
Decreased to 9300 per mm3 on admission, increased to 11,200 on 9th day, then increased to 14,300 on 16th day, and decreased to 9200 on 20th day.
Increased to 0.28 mg/dl on admission, decreased to <0.17 mg/dl on 9th day, and remained <0.17 mg/dl on 16th and 20th day.
Decreased to 33.3 sec on 9th day, 32.4 sec on 16th day.
Increased to 15.7 sec on 9th day, then decreased to 13.7 sec on 16th day.
Decreased to mean level of 70 μ mol/liter following treatment.
